ClientApplication - Class in stream_tcp
A client connects to a specific server and then chats with other people.

A client connects to a specific server and then chats with other people.

ClientInterface - Class in stream_udp
A client connects to a specific server and then chats with other people.
ClientInterface(InetAddress, InetAddress, int, String) - Constructor for class stream_udp.ClientInterface
Constructor Initialize a MulticastSocket to communicate with the server and a specific group Creates a User Interface for the client to chat
ClientThread - Class in stream_tcp
A ClientThread is created for each client who is connected to a server.
ClientThread(Socket) - Constructor for class stream_tcp.ClientThread
Constructor Initializes the client's socket.
connectUser() - Method in class stream_udp.ClientInterface
Indicates to the group that a new client is connected displays every last messages for the new connected client and launches the reception thread for the client.
